mapper.select: SELECT QPS.PLNT_CD , QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.PITM_CD , QPS.PITM_VER , QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD , SDPROC.DTL_NM AS SPEC_PROC_NM , QPS.DEL_YN , QPS.USE_VER_YN , QPS.RVS_NO , QPS.DOC_NO , QPS.RVS_DT , QPS.ENFO_DT , QPS.RVS_REA_CD , QPS.RVS_CTT , QPS.RVS_DIV_PS , QPS.REVW_UID , SU1.USER_NM AS REVW_UNM , QPS.REVW_DS , QPS.REVW_IP , QPS.PITM_ANS_SPEC_APR_IDX , QPS.RJT_UID , SU2.USER_NM AS RJT_UNM , QPS.RJT_DS , QPS.RJT_REA , QPAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPAS.AITM_SPEC_VER FROM QM_PITM_SPEC QPS LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_AITM_SPEC QPAS ON QPS.PLNT_CD = QPAS.PLNT_CD AND QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = QPAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SDPROC ON QPS.PLNT_CD = SDPROC.PLNT_CD AND QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD = SDPROC.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU1 ON QPS.REVW_UID = SU1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU2 ON QPS.RJT_UID = SU2.USER_ID WHERE QPS.PLNT_CD =#{plntCd} AND QPS.PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND QPS.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY QPAS.AITM_SPEC_VER DESC, QPS.UDT_DS DESC, QPS.PITM_VER DESC, QPS.USE_VER_YN DESC

SELECT QPSA.PLNT_CD , QPSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPSA.AITM_SEQ , QPSA.ANS_DPT_CD , QPSA.AMITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , QPSA.AITM_ORD , QPSA.PERSPEC_TXT , QPSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , QPSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , QPSA.SPEC_TYP , QPSA.JDG_TYP , QPSA.PER_SLV_LOW , QPSA.PER_SLV_UPP , QPSA.PER_SLV_DESC , QPSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , QPSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , QPSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , QPSA.SLV_JDG_CFM , QPSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , QPSA.RST_UNIT_CD , QPSA.RST_DPNT , QPSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , QPSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , QPSA.RPT_PRT_YN , QPSA.ISP_DPT_CD , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_QTY , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , QPSA.ISP_DUR_TM , QPSA.EQM_USE_TM , QPSA.AITM_RMK , QPSA.MKR_QTY FROM QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM QPSA LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON QPSA.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(QPSA.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx} ORDER BY QPSA.AITM_ORD

SELECT M.AITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , M.AITM_EN , M.AITM_ABBR , MA.AMITM_CD , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , MA.VRIA_EN , MA.RMK , MA.USE_YN FROM MS_AMITM MA LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON MA.AITM_CD = M.AITM_CD WHERE 1=1
AND MA.VRIA_KN LIKE '%' || #{vriaKn} || '%'
AND M.AITM_KN LIKE '%' || #{aitmKn} || '%'
ORDER BY MA.AITM_CD

SELECT QP.PITM_CD , QP.PITM_VER , QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD , SPC.DTL_NM AS SPEC_PROC_NM , QPI.PITM_TYP , PT.DTL_NM AS PITM_TYP_NM , QPI.PITM_NM , QPI.PITM_EN , QPI.CRG_DPT_CD , SD.DPT_NM AS CRG_DPT_NM FROM QM_PITM_SPEC QPS LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QP.PITM_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPS.PITM_VER AND QP.SPEC_PROC_CD = #{qpSpecProcCd} LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QPS.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD AND QPS.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SPC ON QPS.PLNT_CD = SPC.PLNT_CD AND QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD = SPC.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL PT ON QPI.PLNT_CD = PT.PLNT_CD AND QPI.PITM_TYP = PT.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_DPT SD ON SD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QPI.CRG_DPT_CD = SD.DPT_CD WHERE QPS.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QPS.USE_VER_YN = 'Y' AND QP.USE_VER_YN = 'Y' AND QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD = #{specProcCd} AND QPI.PITM_TYP = #{pitmTyp} AND QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX IS NOT NULL
AND QPI.PITM_NM LIKE '%' || #{pitmNm} || '%'
AND QPS.PITM_CD LIKE '%' || #{pitmCd} || '%'
ORDER BY PITM_CD, PITM_SPEC_IDX

SELECT QPSA.PLNT_CD , QPSA.ANS_DPT_CD , QPSA.AMITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , QPSA.AITM_ORD , QPSA.PERSPEC_TXT , QPSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , QPSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , QPSA.SPEC_TYP , QPSA.JDG_TYP , QPSA.PER_SLV_LOW , QPSA.PER_SLV_UPP , QPSA.PER_SLV_DESC , QPSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , QPSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , QPSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , QPSA.SLV_JDG_CFM , QPSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , QPSA.RST_UNIT_CD , QPSA.RST_DPNT , QPSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , QPSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , QPSA.RPT_PRT_YN , QPSA.ISP_DPT_CD , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_QTY , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , QPSA.ISP_DUR_TM , QPSA.EQM_USE_TM , QPSA.AITM_RMK , QPSA.MKR_QTY FROM QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM QPSA LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON QPSA.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(QPSA.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx} ORDER BY QPSA.AITM_ORD

SELECT #{plntCd} AS PLNT_CD , NULL AS AITM_SPEC_IDX , ROWNUM AS AITM_SEQ , ROWNUM AS AITM_ORD , MESD.LAB_NO , PRD_DIV , MESD.AMITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , LAB_NO_ERP_CODE , MKR_QTY , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (PER_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND PER_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE DECODE(MKR_QTY, NULL, '', MKR_QTY || '%에 대하여 ') || DECODE(PER_SLV_LOW, NULL, '', PER_SLV_LOW || ' 이상 ') || DECODE(PER_SLV_UPP, NULL, '', PER_SLV_UPP || ' 이하') END, SPEC_TXT) AS PERSPEC_TXT , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (OWC_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND OWC_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE DECODE(MKR_QTY, NULL, '', MKR_QTY || '%에 대하여 ') || DECODE(OWC_SLV_LOW, NULL, '', OWC_SLV_LOW || ' 이상 ') || DECODE(OWC_SLV_UPP, NULL, '', OWC_SLV_UPP || ' 이하') END, SPEC_TXT) AS OWC_SPEC_TXT , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (OWC_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND OWC_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN 'S0060002' ELSE 'S0060001' END, 'S0060001') AS SPEC_TYP , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, 'S0070003', 'S0070001') AS JDG_TYP -- 적부판정 or 수치형(이상/이하) , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, NULL, 'U0080001') AS SLV_JDG_CFM -- 무조건 적합 코드 , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, NULL, 'U0080002') AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM -- 무조건 부적합 코드 , UNIT AS RST_UNIT_CD , MESD.RMK AS AITM_RMK , NULL AS ANS_DPT_CD , NULL AS PER_SLV_DESC , NULL AS OWC_SLV_DESC , NULL AS SPEC_TXT_EN , NULL AS RST_DPNT , NULL AS RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , NULL AS RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , NULL AS RPT_PRT_YN , NULL AS ISP_DPT_CD , NULL AS SMP_CLLT_QTY , NULL AS SMP_CLLT_UNIT , NULL AS ISP_DUR_TM , NULL AS EQM_USE_TM FROM MS_ELN_SPEC_DTL MESD LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON MESD.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(MESD.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD INNER JOIN (SELECT QPI.PITM_TYP , QPIS.LAB_NO FROM QM_PITM_INFO QPI LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO_SAP QPIS ON QPI.PITM_CD = QPIS.PITM_CD AND QPI.PLNT_CD = QPIS.PLNT_CD AND QPI.PITM_VER = QPIS.PITM_VER WHERE QPI.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPI.PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND QPI.PITM_VER = #{pitmVer}) QPITM ON QPITM.LAB_NO = MESD.LAB_NO WHERE PRD_DIV = #{prdDiv}

SELECT #{plntCd} AS PLNT_CD , NULL AS AITM_SPEC_IDX , ROWNUM AS AITM_SEQ , ROWNUM AS AITM_ORD , MESD.LAB_NO , PRD_DIV , MESD.AMITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , LAB_NO_ERP_CODE , MKR_QTY , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (PER_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND PER_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE DECODE(MKR_QTY, NULL, '', MKR_QTY || '%에 대하여 ') || DECODE(PER_SLV_LOW, NULL, '', PER_SLV_LOW || ' 이상 ') || DECODE(PER_SLV_UPP, NULL, '', PER_SLV_UPP || ' 이하') END, SPEC_TXT) AS PERSPEC_TXT , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (OWC_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND OWC_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE DECODE(MKR_QTY, NULL, '', MKR_QTY || '%에 대하여 ') || DECODE(OWC_SLV_LOW, NULL, '', OWC_SLV_LOW || ' 이상 ') || DECODE(OWC_SLV_UPP, NULL, '', OWC_SLV_UPP || ' 이하') END, SPEC_TXT) AS OWC_SPEC_TXT , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, CASE WHEN (OWC_SLV_LOW IS NULL AND OWC_SLV_UPP IS NULL) THEN 'S0060002' ELSE 'S0060001' END, 'S0060001') AS SPEC_TYP , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, 'S0070003', 'S0070001') AS JDG_TYP -- 적부판정 or 수치형(이상/이하) , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, NULL, 'U0080001') AS SLV_JDG_CFM -- 무조건 적합 코드 , DECODE(SPEC_TXT, NULL, NULL, 'U0080002') AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM -- 무조건 부적합 코드 , UNIT AS RST_UNIT_CD , MESD.RMK AS AITM_RMK , NULL AS ANS_DPT_CD , NULL AS PER_SLV_DESC , NULL AS OWC_SLV_DESC , NULL AS SPEC_TXT_EN , NULL AS RST_DPNT , NULL AS RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , NULL AS RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , NULL AS RPT_PRT_YN , NULL AS ISP_DPT_CD , NULL AS SMP_CLLT_QTY , NULL AS SMP_CLLT_UNIT , NULL AS ISP_DUR_TM , NULL AS EQM_USE_TM FROM MS_ELN_SPEC_DTL MESD LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON MESD.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(MESD.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE PRD_DIV = #{prdDiv} AND LAB_NO = #{labNo}
